articles.title: Why does Microsoft want to "cut off" rival AI search tools from access to its Bing search index? - Tech Wire Asia
articles.description: Since Microsoft has triggered hype around AI chatbots with OpenAI's ChatGPT into its products and services, rivals are doing the same.
articles.content:
• Microsoft has told at least two customers that access to the company’s internet search index will be cut off if they continue to use it for their AI chatbots.

articles.title: Ukraine Receives 18 Leopard 2 Main Battle Tanks From Germany Besides 40 Marder IFV – Spiegel - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Ukraine has received 18 German Leopard 2 main battle tanks, as promised by Germany, Spiegel reported on Monday. According to Spiegel, Ukraine also received approximately 40 Marder armored infantry fighting vehicles. The German government is not disclosing the…
articles.content:
Ukraine has received 18 German Leopard 2 main battle tanks, as promised by Germany, Spiegel reported on Monday.
